column4: lol I was going to get away from all the make-kpkg crap and just do it manualy (make && make modules_install) and add an entry to grub.conf but grub.conf is menu.lst now and I don't remember how to specify the root the old way
im thinking maby i should get back to gentoo
debian maybe. i wouldnt use gentoo :)

I don't know about the whole debian system. I'm sure it's great but I don't know how to do the basic crap with it. I know how to build a kernel for this box under gentoo because it just uses the basics. grub doesn't use grub.conf anymore but menu.lst is the same format
